title: All the roads within lay-out will be constructed and got ready within six months from the date of sanctioning the layout
clause_text: All the roads within lay-out will be constructed and got ready within six months from the date of sanctioning the layout.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -
